title: Copilot Spaces Public Sharing
description: GitHub released major updates to Copilot Spaces including public sharing capabilities, individual user sharing, direct file addition, and enhanced code viewer integration.

title: Model Options Expansion
description: GitHub expanded model options for Copilot Coding Agent with new GPT-5.1-Codex-Max model available in Copilot CLI and enhanced model selection for Pro subscribers.

title: Claude Code Slack Integration
description: Anthropic launched Claude Code integration with Slack, allowing developers to delegate coding tasks directly from Slack chat threads, making AI coding more accessible in existing workflows.

community_feedback.quote: Claude Code in Slack signals shift to collaboration-first AI coding
Hacker News thread showed modest engagement with 5 points
